des: "If you love to kick up your favorite dishes - this is the perfect sauce!  It is very easy, fast and delicious!"
ins: Place tomatoes and jalapenos in a pot, and cover with water.  Bring to a boil, and cook until the tomatoes and jalapenos turn light green, about 15 minutes.  Drain well, and place in a blender with the onion, lime juice, salt, pepper, and cilantro.  Puree to desired consistency and chill.
